text: Vajiravudh (Thai: วชิราวุธ, RTGS: Wachirawut, 1 January 1881 – 26 November 1925) was the sixth monarch of Siam under the Chakri dynasty as Rama VI. He ruled from 23 October 1910 until his death in 1925. Category:1881 births Category:1925 deaths Category:Monarchs of Thailand Category:20th-century Thai monarchs
title: Vajiravudh
